CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 27, 1957, pg. 24, reads: "Bermuda Shorts Winners - These pretty young lassies were winners at the Bermuda Ball held at the Fort Pitt Hotel. Left to right, they are Bettilou Finney, second; Barbara Scott, first, and Betty Givens, third. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Young men and women wearing bermuda shorts, dancing in Norse Room in Fort Pitt Hotel
